comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: This is wreckage from the tail of Republic P-47D Thunderbolt (P-47D-2-RE), USAAF Ser. No. 42-7997, lost in an accident at Norwich, England on February 21, 1944. The pilot, Richard C. Brookins, reportedly bailed out safely. See: aviation-safety.net/wikibase/wiki.php?id=116142
